## Duty Belt, Ergonomic

**Solicitation Number:** 202204271/B
**Amendment Number:** 9
**Publication Date:** September 22, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** November 14, 2023 (14:00:00 ET)
**Contracting Entity:** Royal Canadian Mounted Police (Gendarmerie royale du Canada)

**Tender Opportunity:**
This solicitation cancels and supersedes previous requests for the supply of Ergonomic Duty Belts, issued on April 7, 2022. The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) seeks a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for the provision of Ergonomic Duty Belts. The Standing Offer will be valid for two years, with the option to extend for three additional one-year periods.

**Basis of Selection:**
The selection will be based on the Lowest Price per Point.

**Notice Type:**
This opportunity is a Request for Standing Offer (Demande d’Offre à Commandes).

**Geographic Preference:**
The RCMP prefers to purchase Canadian goods, in accordance with Article 503.4 (a) of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement.

**Industry Classification:**
This procurement falls under the following UNSPSC Code: *53102703 (Police uniforms) and GSIN Code: N8465 (Individual Equipment).

**Procurement Method:**
This opportunity will be conducted through Competitive - Open Bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner).

**Trade Agreements:**
This procurement is subject to the provisions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (Accord de libre-échange canadien).

**Contact Information:**
Lisa Latendresse
Procurement, Materiel and Assets Management Branch
Royal Canadian Mounted Police

Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0R2

Email: [lisa.latendresse@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:lisa.latendresse@rcmp-grc.gc.ca)

**Documents:**
Tender documents can be downloaded from the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS): [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities). Canada retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.
